name: Introduction to Communication Studies
description: An introduction to the field of communication studies and the various areas of study within it. This course will cover fundamentals such as mass media, interpersonal communication, and organizational communication.

name: Introduction to Mass Communication
description: A detailed study of the various components that make up the field of mass communication. This course will cover topics such as history, ethics, and technology.

name: Media Writing
description: An introduction to the various types of writing used in the field of mass communication. This course will focus on writing for print, radio, television, and digital media.

name: Media Production
description: An introduction to the various production techniques used in the field of mass communication. This course will cover topics such as audio, video, and animation.

name: Media Management
description: An introduction to the various management strategies used in the field of mass communication. This course will cover topics such as budgeting, scheduling, and personnel management.
